mapper.select: SELECT SALARY_NO, M.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME, D.NAME AS DEPARTMENT_NAME, P.NAME AS POSITION_NAME, M.EMP_NO AS EMP_NO, P.SUM+ST.SUM AS SUM, PAY_DATE FROM SALARY SA JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MEMBER_NO=SA.MEMBER_NO) JOIN POSITION P ON (M.POSITION_NO=P.POSITION_NO) JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (M.DEPARTMENT_NO=D.DEPARTMENT_NO) JOIN SALARYVIEW SV ON (M.MEMBER_NO=SV.MEMBER_NO) JOIN STEP ST ON (SV.GRADE=ST.GRADE AND SV.POSITION_NO=ST.POSITION_NO) ORDER BY PAY_DATE DESC

SELECT SALARY_NO, M1.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME, M2.NAME AS CREATE_NAME, PAY_DATE, M1.EMP_NO AS EMP_NO, P.NAME AS POSITION_NAME, D.NAME AS DEPARTMENT_NAME, P.SUM AS POSITION_SUM, SV.GRADE AS GRADE, ST.SUM AS STEP_SUM, P.SUM+ST.SUM AS SUM, M1.PROMOTION_DATE AS PROMOTION_DATE FROM SALARY SA JOIN MEMBER M1 ON(M1.MEMBER_NO=SA.MEMBER_NO) JOIN MEMBER M2 ON (M2.MEMBER_NO=SA.CREATE_BY) JOIN POSITION P ON (M1.POSITION_NO=P.POSITION_NO) JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (M1.DEPARTMENT_NO=D.DEPARTMENT_NO) JOIN SALARYVIEW SV ON (M1.MEMBER_NO=SV.MEMBER_NO) JOIN STEP ST ON (SV.GRADE=ST.GRADE AND SV.POSITION_NO=ST.POSITION_NO) WHERE SALARY_NO=#{salaryNo}

SELECT SALARY_NO, M1.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME, PAY_DATE, P.NAME AS POSITION_NAME, D.NAME AS DEPARTMENT_NAME, P.SUM AS POSITION_SUM, SV.GRADE AS GRADE, ST.SUM AS STEP_SUM, P.SUM+ST.SUM AS SUM FROM SALARY SA JOIN MEMBER M1 ON(M1.MEMBER_NO=SA.MEMBER_NO) JOIN POSITION P ON (M1.POSITION_NO=P.POSITION_NO) JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON (M1.DEPARTMENT_NO=D.DEPARTMENT_NO) JOIN SALARYVIEW SV ON (M1.MEMBER_NO=SV.MEMBER_NO) JOIN STEP ST ON (SV.GRADE=ST.GRADE AND SV.POSITION_NO=ST.POSITION_NO) WHERE M1.emp_no = #{empNo}
